full_threads.body:
Dealing with aches and pains? This is for you...
‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
Have issue viewing this email? Click here
Hi Support,

This is just a friendly reminder that you can still claim your free trial class. We have extended our offer for select classes. Attend class before July 18th (or until spots are full - limited spots available).


If you're dealing with chronic illness, persistent pains, or even recovering from an injury or surgery, our Refit and Rebound classes are designed with you in mind.
Click here to save your spot now.


To help you decide if these classes are for you (before spots fill up), below are some common FAQs that will help…
"Who are these classes for?"
Exercising with our expert Exercise Physiologist is highly recommended if you are:
◾ Dealing with aches and pains;
◾ Recovering from injury or surgery;
◾ Experiencing lower back pain, poor balance, or restricted mobility;
◾ Managing chronic health conditions, such as Osteoporosis, Osteoarthritis, Sarcopenia, Cancer, Stroke, Multiple Sclerosis, or others.
"What is an Exercise Physiologist?"
An Exercise Physiologist (EP) is an allied healthcare professional who specializes in the study of how the human body responds to physical activity and exercise.

With a strong knowledge of human physiology, end EP can design and implement exercise programs to help you achieve specific health and fitness goals, prevent or manage chronic health conditions, and improve overall well-being.
"I have physical restrictions. How will these classes work for me?"
Our classes are designed with individual needs in mind. These group classes offer Circuit Training with allows you to move at your own pace, regardless of your ability level.

You will receive 1:1 support and guidance with individualized exercises tailored to your specific abilities, needs, and goals, within a small group setting.
"What if I'm not sure which class is right for me?"
No problem! You can still book your free first class to secure your spot.
Once you've completed the form via the link below, we will contact you to help you determine the best fit and schedule your class.
To book your free class, click the link below to
complete a short form and save your spot before classes fill up.

We will then be in touch to schedule your trial class! No pre-assessment needed.
Claim Free Trial Class ➡️
We hope to see you soon!


Kind Regards,
Brendan & the Redo Team


P.S. This offer is only available until July 18th (or until spots are full). Spots are limited due to class size and capacity so don't wait, register now.


Prioritize your health and book your free trial class today!
